title: Kog'Maw Recommended build
body: Kog'Maw has been building {{item:3124}}  for almost two years now, and {{item:3078}}  has been out of the meta for him for so long. I come into ranked, and I see people build it on him, and it seems like we almost lose the game right there unless he get's fed. Kog right now has {{item:3078}}  on his "Essential items," and it just isn't essential, while items like {{item:3124}}  are not there. I was just hoping Riot could fix this. It seems like a huge noob trap that I have experienced and has lost me games. I think riot should change this and if not just remove{{item:3078}} from it and not include guinsoos. It's a hard item to use sometimes.

replies.body: Tell me about it... kat still has boots as her recommended starting item ... rito pls

Kat also has Luden's in there if I'm not mistaken. That item is hardly ever picked up on Kat, not even as a situational item.

Also she doesn't have Liandry's in her core/situational item list, which is extremely odd.
Varus' recommended items are not the greatest either. You'll just have to create your own item set for those champions that are out of date with their sets.
Yup I got forced to play adc one game and i pickecd kog maw because i saw his winrate, I built triforce because it told me too and wondered why i was so weak, then i checked op.gg lmao
